text: Agha Petros (; born 1 April 1880, died 2 February 1932) was an Assyrian military leader during World War I. Petros was born in the Lower Baz village, Ottoman Empire. Agha Petros defeated the Turks in Sauj Bulak and drove them back to Rowanduz. ==Other websites== *Bet Nahrain Category:1880 births Category:1932 deaths Category:Assyrian people
title: Agha Petros
